pli-tv-bi-vb-pc39:6.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc39:6.2: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo antovassaṃ cārikaṃ caranti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc39:6.4: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo antovassaṃ cārikaṃ carissanti haritāni tiṇāni ca sammaddantā, ekindriyaṃ jīvaṃ viheṭhentā, bahū khuddake pāṇe saṅghātaṃ āpādentā”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc39:7.1: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc39:7.2: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā … pe … tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc39:7.4: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo antovassaṃ cārikaṃ carissantī”ti … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc39:7.5: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo antovassaṃ cārikaṃ carantī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc39:7.8: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo antovassaṃ cārikaṃ carissanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc39:7.9: Netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc39:7.10: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc39:8.1: “Yā pana bhikkhunī antovassaṃ cārikaṃ careyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc39:9.4: … pe … ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc39:10.2: purimaṃ vā temāsaṃ pacchimaṃ vā temāsaṃ avasitvā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc39:11.2: kukkuṭasampāte gāme gāmantare gāmantare āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc39:11.3: Agāmake araññe addhayojane addhayojane āpatti pācittiyassa.
